original_text:
that he looked down from his holy height;
    from heaven the Lord looked at the earth,
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 높은 성소에서 굽어보시며 하늘에서 땅을 살펴 보셨으니

sentences.original_text: that he looked down from his holy height
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 거룩한 높은 곳에서 굽어보셨다

sentences.original_text: from heaven the Lord looked at the earth
